net.sf.smc.model

Class SmcFSM

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.smc.model.SmcElement
      • net.sf.smc.model.SmcFSM

  • public final class SmcFSM
extends SmcElement
    The top-level element for a finite state machine model. Contains the global state machine data:
    • The FSM start state name.
    • The optionsal %{, %} raw source code which is copied verbatim to the generated file.
    • The associated context class name.
    • The optional header file containing the context class declaration.
    • The optional list of included header files.
    • The FSM package/namespace name.
    • The list of package and/or class imports.
    • The list of optional forward declarations.
    • The list of state machine maps which containing the states.

      • SmcFSM

        public SmcFSM(java.lang.String name,
      java.lang.String targetFile)
        Creates a finite state machine of the given name. Data members are set to default values.
        Parameters:
        name - The finite state machine name.
        targetFile - The target filename with suffix.
